snippet: Mr. Herzog was hailed as a hero in France in 1950 when he and a fellow climber became the first men to conquer a peak of more than 26,000 feet.
abstract: Maurice Herzog, French mountain climber, dies at age 93.

byline.contributor: Scott Sayare contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Herzog was hailed as a hero in France in 1950 when he and a fellow climber became the first men to conquer a peak of more than 26,000 feet.

headline.main: Maurice Herzog, 93, Dies; Led Historic Himalaya Climb
headline.print_headline: Maurice Herzog, 93, Dies; Led Historic Himalaya Climb
